Details

TADS 3 Library: Resolvers. This module defines the Resolver classes. A Resolver is an abstract object that the parser uses to control the resolution of noun phrases to game objects. Specialized Resolver subclasses allow noun phrases to be resolved differently according to their grammatical function in a command.

Summary of Classes  

` [ActorResolver](../object/ActorResolver.html)  [CommandActorAction](../object/CommandActorAction.html)  [IobjResolver](../object/IobjResolver.html)  [PossessiveResolver](../object/PossessiveResolver.html)  [ProxyResolver](../object/ProxyResolver.html)  [Resolver](../object/Resolver.html)  [TopicQualifierResolver](../object/TopicQualifierResolver.html)  `
